item.title: Tables & chairs, redundant phone box & illegal A-board sign, 19th August
item.description:
Tables & chairs obstructing the narrow footway, redundant telephone boxes and illegal A-board sign all contribute to making this area very difficult to walk through, particularly if you are Blind/visually impaired.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Winchester Place footway is now a space for llegal, 19th August
item.description:
The narrow footway of Winchester Place, Dalston is now a place for illegal parking of particularly motorbikes and large cargo bikes.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 98p shop obstructs almost all the footway, 19th August
item.description:
The 98p shop at 72 Kingsland High Street, London E8 2NS has goods spread out too far on the footway, frequently blocking the remaining narrow section with extra material. The shop front licence for this shop needs to be reviewed and possibly revoked.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Works finished, the barriers need to be removed, 19th August
item.description:
Thames Water has finished this work. The barriers have been left, unnecessarily blocking the footway. Please ensure they remove them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Birkbeck Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water fountain, 19th August
item.description:
Hi it looks like the water fountain is working out of schedule. It used to go off at 12:30 by night and on at 8 morning but lately it’s completely out of schedule. It’s now 2:18 by night and it’s still on and in the morning at 10 it’s still off
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Common, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle in Bromley, 19th August
item.description:
There is a vehicle (Mercedes Benz Van that is NOT taxed and with expired MOT) that has been abandoned behind High Street 60, BR1 1EG, in Bromley. The owner of the vehicle is Gabriele Ferrari and his phone number is: 07305893229. The vehicle is just behind a Restaurant, where Gabriele was the tenant until a few month ago. Now the new tenant was contacted by the Landlord, requesting the vehicle to be moved. Unfortunately Mr. Ferrari does not pick up the phone. So I am reporting this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ringers Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow lines need repainting, 19th August
item.description:
Please can the yellow lines in Sidewood Road SE9 2EZ outside 51 & 53 please be repainted? The yellow line markings have worn away and people keep parking their cars in front of my driveway. If the yellow lines were were more visable, I feel there is less of a chance people would park their cars across my drive at 51 Sidewood Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Sidewood Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12 Philip walk, 19th August
item.description:
Reported the rubbish dumped out side no12 gate it is there rubbish reported on Sunday but as usual it was taken away on Monday morning now they have dumped tins of paint but don't worry it free for them as tomorrow morning it will be collected free of charge think we should all do this just dump our rubbish out side of our gates as you don't care you just take it away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Philip Walk, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
